briefTitle: A Study in Patients With Neovascular Age Related Macular Degeneration or Macular Edema Secondary To Retinal Vein Occlusion to Evaluate Usability of the Ranibizumab (Lucentis®) Prefilled Syringe (PFS)
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Single-Arm Phase IIIb Study in Patients With Neovascular Age-Related Macular Degeneration or Macular Edema Secondary to Retinal Vein Occlusion to Evaluate the Usability of Lucentis® 0.5 mg Prefilled Syringe
summary: This is a multicenter study designed to evaluate usability of ranibizumab PFS in patients with neovascular age related macular degeneration or macular edema secondary to retinal vein occlusion.
